name: Adventure of Bears
description:
Adventure of Bears is a platformer 2d game in which you are a Bear. You must to run through differents jungles and other dangerous places by avoiding obstacles and enemies.

Kill the boss at the last stage of each level and unlock new characters.

Key Features:
- Control the bear and kill the enemies
- Catch maximum coins in the big jungle
- Special rewards and power-ups
- Cool sounds effects
- Tutorials
